seo_metadata.title: Frontend developer Rene Linares
seo_metadata.description: Hi! My name is Rene, and I am a frontend developer with 2 years of experience. I am Cuban, but I have been living in Russia for over 4 years, so I speak Russian very well and have permission to work in this country. I have professional experience in frontend development, especially with Vue and Nuxt frameworks. My skills allow me to successfully fulfill my responsibilities, including handling complex tasks, and I am constantly seeking professional growth.

about_me_section.title: About me
about_me_section.text:
Hi! My name is Rene, and I am a frontend developer with 2 years of experience.
I am Cuban, but I have been living in Russia for more than 4 years, so I speak Russian very well and I have permission to work in this country.
I have professional experience in frontend development, especially with the Vue and Nuxt frameworks.

skills_list: Solid knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SASS/SCSS preprocessor, Vue and Nuxt frameworks;
Specialized knowledge of the framework Vue/Nuxt (options API and compositions API) and other modules of this ecosystem (Vue Router, Vuex, Pinia, Vuetify);
Creating cross-browser compatible, responsive, and/or fluid layouts with valid code, as well as CSS animations and transitions;

Deep understanding of JavaScript's asynchronous nature and its application in Backend and Frontend. Writing high-quality and grammatically correct asynchronous code for sending/handling requests to REST APIs;
Good understanding of the MVC and FLUX architectures;
Good knowledge of Node runtime environment and Express backend framework. Basic understanding of databases and Postgres SQL;
Good knowledge of Websocket and library Socket.io;
Working with the terminal and using Git version control system in every project.

certificates_section.title: Certificates
certificates_section.text: I strive to constantly improve, which you can see by looking at my certificates. Most of the courses and certificates I obtained from the popular platform
certificates_names_list: Complete Theoretical Course on HTML and CSS
Complete Practical Course on HTML and CSS
Course on Mobile First Responsive Design
Course on Closures and Scope on JavaScript
Basic Course on Object-Oriented Programming with JavaScript
Intermediate Course on Object-Oriented Programming with JavaScript
Course on Array Methods with JavaScript
Course on Web Design with Flexbox and CSS Grid
Course on Transform and Transition with CSS
Course on REST API with JavaScript

projects_list.title: Web application for tracking daily tasks (Frontend)
details: Elastic layout design oriented towards mobile devices;
Creating and writing components and programming their functionality (Nuxt2 - Options API);
Interacting with Backend through RESTful API;
Managing user account using JWT and localStorage;
Launching the application in SPA (Single Page App) and PWA (Progressive Web App) mode.

projects_list.title: Web application for tracking daily tasks (Backend)
details: Creating and configuring a database on Postgres SQL;
CRUD service for managing data in the database;
Middlewares for filtering requests from the client side and also for authentication and authorization using JWT;
Writing endpoints for RESTful API;
Connecting to an SMTP server for sending emails to users for email confirmation and password recovery.

projects_list.title: Web application analog of the board game “Spyfall”
details: Elastic layout design oriented towards mobile devices;
Creating and writing components and programming their functionality (Vue2 - Options API);
Using sessionStorage and localStorage for data persistence since the app works without a backend;
Vue-router for navigation.

projects_list.title: Blog about IT and online courses
details: Elastic layout design;
Creating and writing components and programming their functionality (Nuxt2 - Options API);
Customization of the Wordpress admin panel using PHP language;
Creating a Backend and API;
Integration with CMS (Wordpress) through API.

projects_for_companies_section.title: Some projects with my participation
projects_for_companies_section.details_text: What I did for the project:

Creation of a toggle switch between dark and light themes;
Writing and programming the entire Frontend using Nuxt2 (Options API);
Interaction with Backend through REST API;
Account management using JWT and localStorage;
(Still in development)

details: Elastic layout of all pages according to the design;

(Still in development)

Interaction with Backend through REST API;
Site modifications.

projects_list.title: Corporate website of SKYTECHNIC company

Interaction with Backend through REST API;
Creating animation for the entire website and complex preloader.

projects_list.title: Corporate website with market analytics for E-commerce in Russia
details: Support for Frontend project and writing new components on Nuxt2 (Options API);
Interaction with Backend through REST API;
Site modifications.

projects_list.title: Wholesale online store for lamps and chandeliers

projects_list.title: Nasledie - a portal for creating a “Life Capsule”

projects_list.title: Website on Tilda with integration with other services.
details: Customizing some blocks using CSS;
Integration with Unisender and Bitrix24;
